description: Define polynomials Pn by P0 = 0, P1 = x, P2 = P1 + P0, P3 = P2 * P1, P4 = P3 + P2, etc. alternately adding or multiplying. For even n>2k, then first k coefficients of Pn remain unchanged and their values are the first k terms of the sequence.
author: James Boudinot (jboudinot(AT)yahoo.com)
